answerList: When the two left sensors in front detect nothing, Thymio's top LEDs become light blue.
When the two left sensors in front detect something, Thymio's top LEDs become light blue.
When the two left sensors in front detect nothing, Thymio's bottom LEDs become light blue.
When any one of the two left sensor in front detect something, Thymio's top LEDs become light blue.
When the two left sensors in front detect something, Thymio's bottom LEDs become light blue.
When any one of the two left sensor in front detect nothing, Thymio's top LEDs become light blue.
